lead_paragraph: Spending edged up 0.1 percent last month as households cut back on goods purchases after a downwardly revised 0.1 percent gain in January.

headline.print_headline: Consumer Spending Rose Only Slightly in February
headline.main: Consumer Spending Rose Slightly in February

snippet: Spending edged up 0.1 percent last month as households cut back on goods purchases after a downwardly revised 0.1 percent gain in January.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports that consumer spending rose 0.1 percent in February, and downwardly revised January decline to 0.1 percent; other reports indicate retreating inflation.
